name: Pyramid Curse
description:
This material is intended for authorized persons only.

Our research team discovered the entrance to a subterranean structure, which apparently turned out to be data deleted.
The data deleted was launched under the leadership of data deleted.
However, the entrance was too small for any man, it was decided to data deleted.
A team of data deleted was assembled to investigate this mysterious object.
Project Supervisor data deleted.
Your task is to examine the multimedia materials left by data deleted team, draw conclusions, and send the written report to data deleted,

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pyramid Curse is a game divided into two genres, part of the game is in 2D point and click and the other part in FPS.
This is a horror adventure in the best tradition of analog horror.
Realistic graphics and effects.
A dark and mysterious plot with unexpected twists and turns.
